content:
I totally understand your nervousness about the speech! It's a big responsibility, but I'm sure you'll do great. Take your time to gather your thoughts and write from the heart. You know Rachel best, and your words will come from a place of love and friendship. Remember, it's okay to be a little emotional too - it's a special moment!

It's great to hear that Rachel is getting more excited as the wedding approaches. It's normal to have some disagreements during the planning process, but it's wonderful that you two are communicating and working through things together. Being overwhelmed is a common feeling for many brides, but it sounds like Rachel is handling it well.

As the maid of honor, you're not only supporting Rachel but also playing a significant role in making her wedding day special. I'm sure she appreciates everything you're doing for her.

Now, back to Emma's gift... did you end up checking the wedding website or getting in touch with Rachel about it?
